translation: Rạcz hund qsm yylhi so vurun kri (th pth chyzs thavi pnnis anhi gttis mnz czvur)
Byyhi dohuk qsm yylhi suh pzlhi.
Byyhi ts dhat sund (qsm) yymụ̄ (pth chyzs mnz) nrth madh pạd kor.
Be shk chhe tuhnz kvshsh mkhtlf (th byon).
Vonụ̄yymụ̄ (panun mal Allah tʿālyā snzi vathi mnz) diyut byyhi vrtạvn prhyzgạry.
Yyhi kor tmụ̄ (khrchavnh kh th prhyzgạry hndi dhryʿh) rczruk (yʿny dyni ḥquk th ạkhrtuk) tṣdyq.
Tylhi krv asụ̄ ʿnqryb ts āsạny (yʿny rẓaʿe alāhy) khạṭr shvlyt frahm.
Th yymụ̄ bkhl kor th (ḥq chh vathi mnz mal khrch krnh nishhi) rvudbe prvah.
Th (yithh pạtthụ̄) kor tmụ̄ rczrs (yʿny dyni ḥqs th ạkhrts) ankar.
Tylhi krv asụ̄ ʿnqryb ts skhty (yʿny ʿdhabs kun pknh) khạṭr shvlyt frahm(takh suh bnhi tyzy san ʿdhabuk ḥqdar).
Th tmụ̄ sund mal lghi nh ts kunhi bkar yylhi suh hlakts (yʿny hlakt kis chahs) mnz pyyhi.
Be shk chhe (ḥqch) vath havnụ̄ sanhi dhmh.
Th be shk chih asy ạkhrtkụ̄ th dnyahkụ̄ mạlk.
Lhādha chihvme tohụ̄ (jhnm kh) nar nishhi khvcznạvimtụ̄ yath lmbkh chih vothan.
Yath mnz anthạyy bdbkhts varạe khnụ̄ dạkhl gczihh nh.
Yymụ̄ (dyni ḥqs) ankar kor byyhi phirun (rsvl sndi aṭaʿt nishhi) buth.
Th tamhi (nar) nishhi yiyhi suh bodd prhyzgar shkhṣ bchavnh.
Yus pnun mal (Allah tʿālyā snzi vathi mnz) divan chuh zi (pnnhi janch th malch) pakyzgy kri ḥạṣl.
Th kạnshi hund chuhnh ts pytth kanhh aḥsan zi yymiyuk bdlh āshi dinh yivan.
Blkh (suh) chuh ṣrf pnnis ʿẓym rb snzi rẓa ḥạṣl krnh khạṭr (mal khrch kran).
Th ʿnqryb gczihh suh (Allah tʿālyā sndi anʿām nishhi th Allah tʿālyā tmụ̄ snzi vfadạry nishhi) rạẓụ̄.
